Class TwoLightsLocalizer

java.lang.Object
  TwoLightsLocalizer

public class TwoLightsLocalizer
extends java.lang.Object

Class used to do the light localization using 2 light sensors placed at the axle track level.

Author:
Thomas Raynaud de Lage

Constructor Detail

TwoLightsLocalizer

public TwoLightsLocalizer(TwoWheeledRobot robot,
                          ColorSensor aLightSensor,
                          ColorSensor bLightSensor,
                          Odometer odometer)
Constructor for the TwoLightsLocalizer.

Parameters:
robot - the robot
aLightSensor - the light sensor on the left of the axle track
bLightSensor - the light sensor on the right of the axle track
odometer - the odometer
Method Detail

doLightLocalization

public void doLightLocalization()
Performs the light localization. Ensures the robot is positioned at {0,0,0}.

goForwardAndAlign

public void goForwardAndAlign()
The robot goes forward until one of the light sensors catches a line. When it does it rotates until the other light sensor finds catches the line.
